content: अभ्याश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Near, proximate. --शः {@--1@} Reaching to, pervading. {@--2@} Proximate neighbourhood, vicinity (also written as अभ्यास <ab>q. v.</ab>); वायसाभ्याशे समुपविष्टः <ls>Pt. 2</ls>: सहसाभ्यागतां भैमीमभ्याशपरिवर्तिनीं <ls>Mb.</ls>, <ls>Dk. 62.</ls> {@--3@} Result, consequence. {@--4@} Prospect, hope of gaining; hence <ab>oft.</ab> used in the sense of ‘quickly’.
